meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Marnie Cox Mike Lally Joel Pool Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6382.

td.p: Marnie Cox, an attorney from Astoria, New York
Mike Lally, a food safety inspector from Ada, Michigan
Joel Pool, a real estate developer from Oakland, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $16,700)

tr.td: THE INDIANAPOLIS 500
(Alex: ...which is coming up this weekend.)
INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS
WRITER'S DICTIONARY
IN PERE-LACHAISE CEMETERY
(Alex: ...in... outside of Paris.)
GIVE ME A PRIZE!
"IFY" ANSWER CORRECTLY

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'This school\'s boilermaker band has been part of the pre-race ceremonies since 1919')

tr.td: This school's boilermaker band has been part of the pre-race ceremonies since 1919

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Joel
Mike
Marnie
THE COMMONWEALTH OF NATIONS
FROM THE SANSKRIT
YOUR DAY IN "C"OURT
NATIVE AMERICANS BY TRIBE
BEFORE & AFTER GOES TO THE MOVIES
(Alex: And finally, in honor of healthy vision month, which this is, we'll test your...)
EYE Q

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Joel
Mike
Marnie

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Revealing Mike\'s response] Governor of [*], Governor Orval Faubus. You are right.)
MikeWhat is Arkansas
$799
MarnieWhat is Mississippi?
$13,000
JoelWhat is Arkansas
$15,100
Arkansas')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'On September 5, Dwight Eisenhower told this state\'s governor that "the federal Constitution will be upheld by me by every legal means"')

tr.td: On September 5, Dwight Eisenhower told this state's governor that "the federal Constitution will be upheld by me by every legal means"
Joel
Mike
Marnie
2-day champion: $48,400
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
Joel
Mike
Marnie

13 R,
4 W
(including 1 DD)

16 R
(including 2 DDs),
1 W
